headline: Applied Materials (AMAT) Sees 40% DRAM Revenue Growth in 2025, Mizuho Maintains Outperform
summary: Mizuho analyst Vijay Rakesh recently lowered the price target on Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) to $195 from $205 and kept an Outperform rating on the shares. AMAT provides equipment, services, and software for the semiconductor industry. The company reported an in-line quarter but faces headwinds in China, the analyst told investors in a research note. […]
